text: 30. O foolish Elisha, for feeding the prophets with wild and bitter gourds![fn-82-P8273_2215783:42-nf] O Ezra forgetful of Scripture, though he did restore the Scriptures from memory![fn-82-P8274_2215889:43-nf] foolish Paul, who glories in fastings,[fn-82-P8275_2215946:44-nf] if fastings profit nothing.
title: Epistle LXIII.
author: St. Ambrose
